I'm a web developer and designer from Argentina with 6+ years of experience using mostly React. My design background allows me to create products that are true to the creative processes.


I'm always looking for something new to learn or some DIY project to carry out. I'm a free/open source software enthusiast, and in my free time I like watching movies, TV shows, reading books and playing video games.

items.title: Architecting with Google Kubernetes Engine Specialization

experienceItem.description: Currently working as a full-stack dev with the CX-IT team on projects related to the chat virtual assistant for the support site. I worked on the front-end of the chat experience for desktop and on a complete refactor for its animation system. Then, I participated on the creation of an internal library to work with graphs, and now I'm building an internal admin app that allows editing the flows for the assistant.

Design and development of multiple websites for clients like [Pakapaka](http://www.pakapaka.gob.ar/), [Ruka Kuyen](https://ruka-kuyen.com.ar/), [ComisiÃ³n Provincial por la Memoria](https://www.comisionporlamemoria.org/) and [Guardalo.com](https://guardalo.com.ar/)

name: Ian Mancini
